channel.title: Evol
channel.description:
Don't have time anymore, but i had a great time and put a lot of creativity into it. If you have any questions on how to set it up or why something is not working send me a private message. To see everything this has you may check: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,662010.20/topicseen.html It also may have some complexity features un-removed Log[code].LOG 05:56 a.m. 17/05/2014 Created log 05:56 a.m. 17/05/2014 Quests that have been added. -Desert Treasure Bosses -Cook's Assistant -Doric's Quest -Hidden key(Partially started, it's a custom quest) -The restless ghost -Sheep shearer -Rune Mysteries -Imp Catcher 05:56 a.m. 17/05/2014 Misc features -clip -Pickables Added, loading from an external file, that can be edited during server run-time -Objects support, loaded from an external file, that can be edited during server runtime -Consumables support, loaded from an external file, supports potions, food, and can also be edited during server runtime -Created bank At home -Added an interactive basket at home (To take something that is not yours..) -Added cattle for cows and sheep -Added essence mining -Rune Mysteries is now a requirement to enter the essence 06:05 a.m. 17/05/2014 Skills -Clipped firemaking -Fishing (According to my needs, and river troll) -Mining, prospecting -Rune-crafting -Cooking -Smelting 06:07 a.m. 17/05/2014 11:12 a.m. 21/05/2014 -Fillables 11:16 a.m. 21/05/2014 -You can now take items from containers around the world (Just once) (Need to save, because if you logout you can take again)
12:06 p.m. 21/05/2014 -Added more stealable containers -added map -Fixed aubury tele -Added more water sources 12:25 p.m. 21/05/2014
02:52 a.m. 22/05/2014 -Added the punishment when you're caught stealing 09:59 a.m. 30/05/2014 -Added evil chicken 5% chance to fight him when you get back to real world -Added some herblore(Red berry juice, cadava potion, weapon poison) -Added Dagger poisoning -Added Bottle Filling -Added grinding (Pestle with unicorn horn and blue scale) -Added music system(Gotta fix an error Client sided) -Added ratssssssssss 09:47 a.m. 31/05/2014 -Added sounds for attacking with magic, ranged and meele. -Added sounds for npcs getting hit 01:03 p.m. 31/05/2014 -Added weed planting..(It increases evil) 03:55 p.m. 03/06/2014 Rats tails- Done Unicorns - Added UnicornHornDrop - added Weapon posoining - Done Limpwurt roots - Added Limpwurt seeds - Added Limpwurt root planting - Added. Add hillgiants - Added Added mushroom cutting. -There was an error with picking flax, and mushroms and that stuff, if you left the area and joined the area again even if it wasnt time for respawning the object it would appear there-fixed -Hobgoblins added -Fishing spots added -Net drop added -Minor bug patches.. -Placed general store in home. -Added fillables for herblore and farming
02:29 a.m. 05/06/2014 placed some stores and snitches Fixed cattle reward. Handles and heads can now be crafted into axes/pickaxes. Fixed a bug with smithing. worked a bit on drops limpwurt root planting (Farming) Spinning 06:40 p.m. 24/09/2014 [/code]
Some things i left un done [code]Added pickpocketing experience by stealing from containers.. added brass key in floor in hill giants. distributed fishing artifacts added spinning added handles/heads
make more evil when u kill inoccent fix firemaking xp fix fishing xp fix wc xp Add hidden key-You find a brass key Fix pickpocketing fix thieving distribute Farming artifacts Witchs potion Romeo and Juliet Distribute pestle and mortar - With a quest. edit starter smithing? remove npcs from edgeville distribute brassKey Drug consuming - Started distribute seeds add teles Fix npcs animation fix music Distribute pickheads distribute axeheads Add handle and heads making Distribute pickaxes add pet summoning Add drug effects Add talisman selling disable magic tab while rune mysteries isn't completed. add teleport tabs send sound on making picks handles and such

And finally the links
This should be all left in your desktop to have quick access on it (You will most likely have to link it with your server, becase it was linked to mine.. i didn't really bother to make it in general go to desktop..) http://shatterhosting.com/evoladdons/Desktop%20Items.rar
The server itself http://shatterhosting.com/evol/Evol.rar

item.title: Evol
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

Anyone happen to have this? My old computer is playing with me and i can’t seem to retrieve it.

Read full topic

item.title: Evol
item.dc:creator: @Quintorz Quintorz
item.description:
@Quintorz wrote:

[quote=“Strucker, post:6, topic:546946”][quote author=Quintorz link=topic=665845.msg4451386#msg4451386 date=1411671749]
Client link ?
[/quote]You can use complexity’s client as i used that, the only thing i guess i modified was to add titles for the religion[/quote]

The client dosent work.
(http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/downloads/498843-complexityrsps-v1-0-a.html)

Read full topic

item.title: Evol
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

Not To Mention i wrote most of the quests as i was a developer in Complexity

Read full topic

item.title: Evol
item.dc:creator: @OmgItsShane Shane
item.description:
@OmgItsShane wrote:

All those quests were already in complexity. Looks like a leech when looking at update logs but I do see some nice quality updates with the sounds, etc. Needs more work to be considered a release without it being just complexity.

Read full topic

item.title: Evol
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“Quintorz, post:5, topic:546946”]Client link ?[/quote]You can use complexity’s client as i used that, the only thing i guess i modified was to add titles for the religion

Read full topic

item.title: Evol
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“Strucker, post:3, topic:546946”][quote author=Mikeyzzz link=topic=665845.msg4451331#msg4451331 date=1411605110]
Just because you have no time, doesn’t mean you release this. You should have kept it and when the time was right continue on it. Regardless great effort and thanks for your contribution.
[/quote]I know i may still continue it later, and it has some weird things on it i mean some things you have to do to get it running properly so a really noob wouldn’t be able to use it properly, and a user with some knowledge could find something useful or learn a thing or two.
And thanks i did work pretty hard.[/quote]Good effort.

Read full topic

item.title: Evol
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“Mikeyzzz, post:2, topic:546946”]Just because you have no time, doesn’t mean you release this. You should have kept it and when the time was right continue on it. Regardless great effort and thanks for your contribution.[/quote]I know i may still continue it later, and it has some weird things on it i mean some things you have to do to get it running properly so a really noob wouldn’t be able to use it properly, and a user with some knowledge could find something useful or learn a thing or two.
And thanks i did work pretty hard.

Read full topic

item.title: Evol
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

Just because you have no time, doesn’t mean you release this. You should have kept it and when the time was right continue on it. Regardless great effort and thanks for your contribution.

Read full topic

item.title: Evol
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

Don’t have time anymore, but i had a great time and put a lot of creativity into it.
If you have any questions on how to set it up or why something is not working send me a private message.
To see everything this has you may check:
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,662010.20/topicseen.html
It also may have some complexity features un-removed
Log[code].LOG
05:56 a.m. 17/05/2014
Created log
05:56 a.m. 17/05/2014
Quests that have been added.
-Desert Treasure Bosses
-Cook’s Assistant
-Doric’s Quest
-Hidden key(Partially started, it’s a custom quest)
-The restless ghost
-Sheep shearer
-Rune Mysteries
-Imp Catcher
05:56 a.m. 17/05/2014
Misc features
-clip
-Pickables Added, loading from an external file, that can be edited during server run-time
-Objects support, loaded from an external file, that can be edited during server runtime
-Consumables support, loaded from an external file, supports potions, food, and can also be edited during server runtime
-Created bank At home
-Added an interactive basket at home (To take something that is not yours…)
-Added cattle for cows and sheep
-Added essence mining
-Rune Mysteries is now a requirement to enter the essence
06:05 a.m. 17/05/2014
Skills
-Clipped firemaking
-Fishing (According to my needs, and river troll)
-Mining, prospecting
-Rune-crafting
-Cooking
-Smelting
06:07 a.m. 17/05/2014
11:12 a.m. 21/05/2014
-Fillables
11:16 a.m. 21/05/2014
-You can now take items from containers around the world (Just once) (Need to save, because if you logout you can take again)

12:06 p.m. 21/05/2014
-Added more stealable containers
-added map
-Fixed aubury tele
-Added more water sources
12:25 p.m. 21/05/2014

02:52 a.m. 22/05/2014
-Added the punishment when you’re caught stealing
09:59 a.m. 30/05/2014
-Added evil chicken 5% chance to fight him when you get back to real world
-Added some herblore(Red berry juice, cadava potion, weapon poison)
-Added Dagger poisoning
-Added Bottle Filling
-Added grinding (Pestle with unicorn horn and blue scale)
-Added music system(Gotta fix an error Client sided)
-Added ratssssssssss
09:47 a.m. 31/05/2014
-Added sounds for attacking with magic, ranged and meele.
-Added sounds for npcs getting hit
01:03 p.m. 31/05/2014
-Added weed planting…(It increases evil)
03:55 p.m. 03/06/2014
Rats tails- Done
Unicorns - Added
UnicornHornDrop - added
Weapon posoining - Done
Limpwurt roots - Added
Limpwurt seeds - Added
Limpwurt root planting - Added.
Add hillgiants - Added
Added mushroom cutting.
-There was an error with picking flax, and mushroms and that stuff,
if you left the area and joined the area again even if it wasnt time for respawning the object it would appear there-fixed
-Hobgoblins added
-Fishing spots added
-Net drop added
-Minor bug patches…
-Placed general store in home.
-Added fillables for herblore and farming

02:29 a.m. 05/06/2014
placed some stores and snitches
Fixed cattle reward.
Handles and heads can now be crafted into axes/pickaxes.
Fixed a bug with smithing.
worked a bit on drops
limpwurt root planting (Farming)
Spinning
06:40 p.m. 24/09/2014
[/code]

Some things i left un done

[code]Added pickpocketing experience by stealing from containers…
added brass key in floor in hill giants.
distributed fishing artifacts
added spinning
added handles/heads

make more evil when u kill inoccent
fix firemaking xp
fix fishing xp
fix wc xp
Add hidden key-You find a brass key
Fix pickpocketing
fix thieving
distribute Farming artifacts
Witchs potion
Romeo and Juliet
Distribute pestle and mortar - With a quest.
edit starter
smithing?
remove npcs from edgeville
distribute brassKey
Drug consuming - Started
distribute seeds
add teles
Fix npcs animation
fix music
Distribute pickheads
distribute axeheads
Add handle and heads making
Distribute pickaxes
add pet summoning
Add drug effects
Add talisman selling
disable magic tab while rune mysteries isn’t completed.
add teleport tabs
send sound on making picks handles and such
